item.description:
At the August Meetup we had a surprise visit from Plone guru Kapil Thangavelu. Kapil ran through a couple of demos and we installed the Plone mailing list product listen.

At the September Meetup, we will continue development on the Plone skin, and install the Poi issue tracker. For a full list of items to be worked on, see the not-officially-launched bostonplone.org website http://www.bostonplon....

This is a great chance to get your hands dirty with Plone, ask questions of more experienced Plone developers, and contribute to making a great resource for the Boston Plone users community. All skill levels are welcome!

Use the south entrance of the collanade building. The entrance is located at the center of the long building running along the reflecting pool.

The parking is on the intersection of Mass Ave and Huntington and as stated is $15. If you park in the garage:
You should use the Sunday school exit (there are huge painted signs) to exit the garage and walk out on the plaza to the colonnade entrance.

You should tell the security guard that you are here for the Plone User Group.

For more information, see http://www.bostonplon...
item.name: The Boston Plone September Meetup
